00063       void end_deliberation() {
00064         m_assembly.mark_inactive();
00065         m_completedThisTick = true;
00066        if( m_steps>1 ) {
00067          syslog()<<"Deliberation completed in "<<m_steps<<" steps";
00068          logPlan();
00069        }
00070       }
00071 
00072       void logPlan() const {
00073          std::string dbg_pln = manager().file_name(getName().str()+".plan.dot");
00074          std::ofstream of(dbg_pln.c_str());
00075          m_assembly.logPlan(of);
00076       }
